# Main Title

Some introduction text.

## Getting Started

This section explains how to get started.

### Prerequisites

You need the following installed:

- Node.js
- npm

### Installation

Run the following command:

```bash
npm install
```

## Usage

Here's how to use it.

### Basic Usage

Just run the command.

### Advanced Usage

For more complex scenarios.

## API Reference

### Functions

#### parseHeadings

Parses headings from content.

#### formatToc

Formats the table of contents.
